Reprocess AKA
0 0 Tactic Tactic
1 Cost = 5 Logic Reactive (May be played or activated anytime you have priority.) Return any number of target nontoken creatures and/or assets you control to your hand. Repeat the following choice for each card returned to your hand this way — • Draw a card, then discard a card. • Create a Vision token.

0 0 Tactic Tactic

Negate AKA
0 0 Tactic Tactic
1 Cost = 1 Logic Reactive (May be played or activated anytime you have priority.) Delete target activated or triggered stack object.
Mystic Refusal AKA
0 0 Tactic Tactic
1 Cost = 5 Logic Alt Cost = Void another card with Logic in its cost from your hand. Reactive (May be played or activated anytime you have priority.) You can’t play Mystic Refusal during your turn. Put target card stack object into its owner’s discard pile. Mystic Refusal deals 3 damage to you.
Mystic Negation AKA
0 0 Tactic Tactic
1 Cost = 2 Logic Alt Cost = Void another card with Logic in its cost from your hand or two cards with Logic in their cost from your discard pile. Reactive (May be played or activated anytime you have priority.) Delete target activated or triggered stack object. Mystic Negation deals 1 damage to you. Pay 1 Logic, discard Mystic Negation: Draw a card.
